definition: to kill sb to prevent them from divulging a secret/to silence sb
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: To silence them in case they had noticed something?
sentences.chinese: 是因爲她怕她們發現她的弱點而想殺人滅口嗎？

sentences.english: The mound to the big house ManMen after wu kill.
sentences.chinese: 冢本拿到大鼎後將鄔家滿門滅口。

sentences.english: The zhen son learned that someone wants to kill ZhangPing to kill that he knew a lot of secrets.
sentences.chinese: 貞兒得知有人要殺章平滅口，懷疑他知道不少祕密。

definition: to leak (of air)/to go flat (of a tire)/to vent one's anger
to play the fool (idiom)/to feign madness
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion

to undermine/to let someone down/to seduce someone away from something

to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between
to leak/to expose (sb's secret)/to spill the beans/to let the cat out of the bag
